trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
